title: Vegetable rice salad
ingredients: ['350g white rice', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided', '1 teaspoon herb-seasoned sea salt (see tip)', '1 tablespoon capers', '1 sprig fresh parsley', 'strips of lemon zest from 1/2 lemon', '3 medium courgettes, peeled and grated', '2 medium carrots, peeled and grated', '1/2 yellow pepper, cubed', '1/2 red pepper, cubed', 'salt, to taste', 'juice of 1 lemon']
